rooms.description: Wider entrance hall designed for wheelchair accessibility with a ramp integrated into the layout.

Combined space for cooking and living, incorporating accessible kitchen cabinets and open living area. Includes wide doorways to facilitate movement, with a view ensuring natural light and adherence to Vastu principles by orienting the main entrance towards the east.
A dedicated space for fitness equipment, designed with non-slip floors and ample clearance for wheelchair accessibility. The gym is located near the living area to encourage a healthy lifestyle.
Accessible guest bathroom with grab bars and wider doorways to ensure ease of movement for individuals with disabilities.

openings.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance door with automatic opening mechanism.
Large windows placed strategically for natural lighting and proper ventilation, aligning with Vastu guidelines.

openings.location: Between Open-plan Kitchen & Living Area and Private Gym
openings.description: A wide door to ensure accessibility between the living area and gym space.
